div.bibl: Dziennik Chicagoski, Mar. 1, 1897. NEW PARISH COMMITTEE CHOSEN FOR ST. STANISLAUS KOSTKA CHURCH

body.p: Yesterday the following were chosen as members of the new parish committee, at the annual meeting of the St. Stanislaus Kostka Church: Peter Kiolbassa, Peter Dabrowski, Francis Sergot, John Gniot, Jacob Mucha, Jacob Tomaszewski, Joseph Paszkiewicz, Jacob Haske, Hubert Abraham, John Czekala, August Szczepanski, W. Barwig, John Arkuszewski, John Klinger, Andrew Packe, Francis Maca, Joseph Czojkie, and Joseph Wrublewski.
On Friday, March 5, the initial meeting of the new committee will be held at 7 P. M. at the rectory of St. Stanislaus Kostka Church.
